fieldUpdates.description: add Response Time in Hours to FollowUp date; Prevents the date from landing on a weekend
fieldUpdates.formula:
IF (Response_Time_in_Hours__c=48,
CASE(MOD((DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) -DATE(1900,1,7),7),
0,DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)+2, 1,DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)+2, 2,DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)+2, 3, DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)+2, 4, DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)+4, 5, DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)+3, 6, DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)+2, NULL),
IF (Response_Time_in_Hours__c=72,
CASE(MOD((DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) -DATE(1900,1,7),7),
0,DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)+3, 1,DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)+3, 2,DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)+3, 3, DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)+5, 4, DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)+5, 5, DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)+5, 6, DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)+4, NULL),
IF (Response_Time_in_Hours__c=24,
CASE(MOD((DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) -DATE(1900,1,7),7),
0,DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)+1, 1,DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)+1, 2,DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)+1, 3, DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)+1, 4, DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)+1, 5, DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)+3, 6, DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)+2, NULL),
IF (Response_Time_in_Hours__c=120,
CASE(MOD((DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) -DATE(1900,1,7),7),
0,DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)+5, 1,DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)+7, 2,DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)+7, 3, DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)+7, 4, DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)+7, 5, DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)+7, 6, DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)+6, NULL),
IF (Response_Time_in_Hours__c=4 ||Response_Time_in_Hours__c=8 ,
CASE(MOD((DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) -DATE(1900,1,7),7),
0,DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)+1, 1,DATEVALUE(CreatedDate), 2,DATEVALUE(CreatedDate), 3, DATEVALUE(CreatedDate), 4, DATEVALUE(CreatedDate), 5, DATEVALUE(CreatedDate), 6, DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)+2, NULL),
NULL)))))

rules.description: Sends an email to the member of the TSR queue when they are assigned.

rules.fullName: MSP%3A Email Notification to floor closing case
rules.description: Email Notification to floor closing case
rules.formula: $RecordType.Name = 'Service Support MSP Case'&& not(BEGINS( $Profile.Name , "System Administrator")) && Not(ISBLANK( ClosedDate ))&& OwnerId ="00G70000001iQCF"

rules.description: Move cases and reference core payroll records when a sell is not a Payroll or Core sell

criteriaItems.value: Service Additional HRO NCT Contact Record Type

rules.description: HRO Update Status field to "In Progress"
when New Client 401k case is created by email to case, prepopulate some fields

rules.fullName: Notification of MMS Payroll Load Acceptance
rules.description: The Sales Rep (Account Owner) receives notification when the Payroll Onboarding case status is changed to Sold Load Accepted.
rules.formula: $RecordType.Name ="Service Onboarding MMS Payroll Case Former" && ISPICKVAL( Status , "Sold Load Accepted") && ISCHANGED( Status )
$RecordType.Id ="012700000001UTh" && IsClosed && CreatedById <> OwnerId
($RecordType.Id ="012Q00000008elb"|| $RecordType.Id ="012Q00000008elc"|| $RecordType.Id ="012Q00000008f0g"|| $RecordType.Id ="012Q00000008hBq") && IsClosed && CreatedById <> OwnerId

rules.description: Schedule Follow to Cases awaiting reponse from creator to proceed

rules.description: Moves the Status to In Completed when the current step is Completed

rules.description: To Populate Project Due Date only when Case is created.

rules.fullName: Preview Field TSS Queue New owner
rules.formula: AND( OR ( Owner:User.Id = "00570000001acEO", Owner:User.Id = "00570000001acES", Owner:User.Id = "00570000002C0Sv", Owner:User.Id = "00570000001N81j", Owner:User.Id = "00570000001RNtJ", Owner:User.Id = "00570000001asXe", Owner:User.Id = "00570000001aj27", Owner:User.Id = "00570000001RNrO", Owner:User.Id = "00570000001R71N", Owner:User.Id = "00570000001RNqF", Owner:User.Id = "0050g000005M5lQ", Owner:User.Id = "00570000001acDB", Owner:User.Id = "00570000001R73D", Owner:User.Id = "005700000055jAp" ), RecordType.DeveloperName="Service_Support_Preview_TSS_Case" )

rules.fullName: Ready%2C Set%2C PUNCH checkbox checked for Subject %22YES Ten Day Punch%22
rules.description: When the subject of a case includes "YES Ten Day Punch", please automatically check the "Ready, Set, PUNCH" checkbox.

criteriaItems.value: New Client HR Solutions,Audit,Exception,New Client MMS,New Client Core,ICE,Escalaton

rules.description: Update Date/Time First Modified field on case.
rules.formula: NOT(ISNEW()) && ( (LastModifiedDate-CreatedDate)*24*60 >= 2 ) && ( RecordType.Name = 'Service Support MPSC Case' || RecordType.Name = 'Service Support GL Case' || RecordType.Name = 'Service Support HRO Case' || RecordType.Name = 'Service Support Icon Case' || RecordType.Name = 'Service Support MSP Case' || RecordType.Name = 'Service Support Nettime Case' || RecordType.Name = 'Service Support OS Field Support Case' || RecordType.Name = 'Service Support STM Case' || RecordType.Name = 'Service Support TAA Case' || RecordType.Name ='Service Onboarding GL Case') && ISBLANK( Date_Time_First_Modified__c )

rules.description: Update Manager Escalation Submitter field with running users email address
rules.formula: (ISNEW() && Manager_Escalation_Needed__c = true) || (ISCHANGED(Manager_Escalation_Needed__c) && Manager_Escalation_Needed__c = true)
